```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
dataset <- read_csv("dataset.csv")
```
```{r}
dataset_per_capita <- dataset[,c(1,8,9,10,2,13,3,4,5,6,7,11,12)]

dataset_per_capita[,6:11] <- dataset_per_capita[,6:11]/dataset_per_capita$population_total
```

```{r}
write_csv(dataset_per_capita, "data_per_capita.csv")
```
